rules_text:
Vigilance, trample
[i]Full Moon Howling[/i] – {1}{G}{G}: Until end of turn, Kagerou becomes a Wolf with base power and toughness 5/5.
flavor_text: [i]“How long has it been since we were told to remain docile? Enough is enough. Our time is now!”[/i]
